column2: Ohhh! So you two are friends with the Warrior of Light and Princess Sarah?
You betcha! So how 'bout a friendly fight?
Heh heh heh, I like your style. Bring it on!
That was a lotta fun! Come back whenever you wanna go another round! So long!
Me and my goblin boys will keep Cornelia safer than a tent in a dungeon, don’t you worry! So long!
What would you like to do?
